channel.title: Nexus Hub [Character Sheet]
channel.description:
# Only post Character Sheet here Discussion of characters can go at https://discord.gg/8TzBntw or https://forum.imperium42.com/t/nexus-interest-check/46724/28
># Character Rule >**Velonia:** >1. Your character, should they be a magic user, should have a method of controlling magic, what this is is up to you, it could be a wand or potions or harnessing mana through leylines >2. Depending on how your magic works, it might not work on other planes, or it may be limited. > >**Callinety Falls:** >1. Your character, should they have metahuman powers, may only have 1 power or 1 type/style of power >2. Callinety Falls is basically present day earth but with crazy powers, so keep it modern and save the crazy technology for the sci fi world >3. Remember, your character may be a metahuman, but they're still human, so don't make them an immortal supergod when their actual power is making fireballs > >**Grand Peninsula:** >1. Steam power has its limit, even though on this plane those limits may be seen as unrealistic, they still exist >2. Steam power is not infinite, it needs water and fuel, sometimes you may not be able to get these things, in this case your machines won't work, deal with it >3. You're only human, any extraordinary abilities your character may possess are due to machines and invention, not any sort of special power. > >**Eleos-12:** >1. Your character, should they be from an alien race, must have purely defined abilities and shortcomings, you don't have to state what they are, but remain consistent >2. You may have all sorts of crazy technology, but the whole nexus thing is pretty new, so you can't communicate or teleport between dimensions using your technology.
**CHARACTER INFORMATION** **Name/Alias:** **Age:** **Gender:** **Plane of Origin:** (Velonia/Grand Peninsula/Callinety Falls/Eleos-12) **Appearance:** (picture or description) **Backstory:** **Others:** **ARCANA REALM** **Species:** (Add explanation if the species is selfmade or non self explanatory) **Magic:** (Add explanation) **Skill:** (For skills not magic involved)
**META REALM:** **Special Ability:** (One special power. Subpower is allowed) **Skill:** (Non power ability like sharshooting or law knowledge)
**TECHNO REALM** **Species:** (Explanation needed for aliens and robots) **Special Ability:** (Add explanation for each ability) **Equipment:**
**STEAMPUNK REALM** **Gadgets:** (Add explanation for the gadget usage) **Skill:** (Abilities should be put here)

item.title: Nexus Hub [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: SadSnake
item.description:
Name/Alias: Mathega
Age: 16
Gender: Male
Plane of Origin:Callinety falls
Appearance: There it is
Backstory:Really just like any other teenager, he suddendly caught a passion to a cardgame he found in his attic. The cards are pretty rare and he made his duty to collect them all, and gets very, very into the rare card battles he can get.
Others: Always wears this duel disk like the nerd he is. Really nervous around girls.

Read full topic

item.title: Nexus Hub [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
(cracks fingers)
Name: Chris T Kal
Age: 23
Gender: male
Plane of origin: Callenity Falls
Plane of residence: 52nd/velonia
Appearence: quite tall (6’ 1.5"), with a mop of curly, reddish-brown hair, and bright green eyes. He usually looks calm/cold and focused, but when talking about his interests he has this crazy smile and his hair somehow gets puffier/curler
Backstory:

Power/s: Crystaline Construction - conjure a crystal of semi-random color/characteristics (depending on location/soil) through the ground, and depending on color/characteristics one can power through them. He is better at using them, both in powers and physical manipulation (ie aiming them when throwing)
Specifics:
Generally, more precisely cut crystals or ones with brighter/clearer colors are stronher
In Eleos, conjures crystals have fluorescent colors. In Velonia, they grow.

Color/power table
Known by Chris:
Purple - storage
Red - destruction
Green/dark green - communication
Light green/lime - strength
Clear/prismic - crystal manipulation (changing color/focus). Power based on clarity instead of brightness
White - passivly strengthens nearby crystals slightly. Also much easier to manipulate with prisms than others
Black: cannot be conjured
Ooc thought of:
Yellow: creation
Grey: crystal merging. Very specific in terms of brightness/cut, effect/product can significantly change with 1 degree brighter or more precisely cut.
Black: cannot be conjured, must be made with a perfectly-clear prism on a pure white crystal. Uses up the prism in the process. Crystal fracturing.
White - when merged with another crystal through grey, focuses said crystals power around crystals, or strengthens their power significantly, depending on the grey

Read full topic

item.description:
Alias: Yami
Age: 18
Gender: Male
Plane of Origin: Velonia
Appearance:

Species: Human
Magic:
Shadowplay: Can manipulate the shadows to do what he wants. He uses his blood in order to form these shadows.

Skill: Stealth

item.title: Nexus Hub [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Braixen
item.description:
Alias: Brakil
Age: 26
Gender: Male
Plane of Origin: Callinety Falls (Meta Realm)
Appearance:
Backstory: Grew up studying psychology with a expertise, once he had a P.H.D he began his work. No-one knows of his power in the Meta Realm and if they had learned it, they would no longer exist on this plane. He is a lone wolf type of person.

Special Ability: Can create voodoo dolls to maniplulate a target, requires blood samples. Damage to the voodoo doll will transfer to the target for a range of 30000 Meters. He can also manipulate what the consciousness of the target is thinking by speaking to the voodoo doll. Can only have 1 at a time.

Skill: Quick Learner, Master Psychologist.

Read full topic

item.title: Nexus Hub [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Damafaud
item.description:
CHARACTER INFORMATION
Name/Alias: Rina Winterfield
Age: 22
Gender: Female
Plane of Origin: Velonia
Species: Human
Magic:
Magic Muse: By voicing her will through a song, Rina is able to cast powerful magic.
Music Tune: Rina can project her voice in order to create certain effects such as lightning and a flash of light.
Skill: Singing skill, violin mastery, novice dagger profieciency
Appearance: Rina Winterfield
Backstory: A muse educated by her mother since young, Rina leaves the small village of Aluine to spreads her name as a bard and deepens her study in magic.
Others: Her violin is called Stravius. A music instrument she received from her mother.

Read full topic

item.title: Nexus Hub [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Shurian
item.description:
Name: Eleanor Deidamia
Age: 29
Gender: Female
Plane of Origin: Velonia
Appearance: Height of 159cm, (She’s not tall so you may reference as such.)

Backstory: Once a happy, bright girl, she saw war and the deaths that occurred during the war. She saw many different types of injuries, and she couldn’t heal them. She sought a magic to heal, and found the Church of Lyncitus. However, the many months of war have left a scar in her heart, and she cannot find a way to feel strong emotions, due to her co-founder sacrificing himself for her. She will feel nostalgic and sad if she hears music that reminds her of her deceased friend.

SPECIES: Neksian

Shurian:

Neksians. They are humanoid cats, with their appearances ranging from completely human to faces of cats. Majority of Neksians however look human.

MAGIC: She excels in healing magic, able to heal mental wounds with a single incantation. She is also proficient at conjuring ice spells, but mostly defensive ones. Has an extraordinary pool of mana.

ITEMS: She has a sword, that is used to heal others and slay those of the dead. (Read Tensaiga from Inuyasha.)

Read full topic

item.title: Nexus Hub [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Munstrish
item.description:
Name/Alias: Lucas Leeves
Age: 35
Gender: Male
Plane of Origin: Grand Peninsula
Appearance: Stern looking face, and likes to wear tweed. Dark haired.
Backstory: He used to be a teacher in the Grand Peninsula when one of his students thought of a brilliant invention, the Super Deployable Box. He stole it and patented it and he is now a fugitive who uses the invention to stay alive. He seeks to find other fugitives and join forces. (He is also gay).
Gadgets: The Super Deployable Box uses steam power to transform into a jetpack, a flamethrower and a robot.
Skill: His agile body allows him to easily escape from threats.

Read full topic

item.title: Nexus Hub [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: photonproton
item.description:
Name/Alias: Jazz Swingman
Age: (♪=22)
Gender: Male
Plane of Origin: Callinety Falls
Appearance: Wears a fedora and a fancy suit and sunglasses
Backstory: Jazz is a famous pop-star. His band (the Crotchets) was slaughtered by skeletons when on tour in Velonia. Jazz now is a solo artist. Jazzfound out the reason he is so good at music is due to a metahuman power to amplify and manipulate sound waves.
Special Ability: Can amplify and manipulate sound (meaning he can make a whisper loud or make ‘hello’ sound like ‘bye’). He has a saxophone which he can focus his power through to make destructive sound waves
Skill: Music Playing, Dancing.

Read full topic

item.title: Nexus Hub [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Munstrish
item.description:
Name/Alias: Jason Trymon (Spazimitism)
Age: 17
Gender: Male
Plane of Origin: Callinety Falls
Appearance: Average height teenager with a permanent smile. Longish brown-blonde hair. Wears a red and blue jumper all the time.
Backstory: He used to be bullied severely at school and tried to kill himself. His father was a famous scientist, so Spaz tried to use a concoction of chemicals from his father’s lab to kill himself (the concoction was named Spazium Epilepsate). He was very allergic to some of the chemicals and before he could drink it he inhaled the fumes and had an allergic reaction. This was an epileptic fit and he felt so good afterwards that he decided to drink the mixture. It not only made him have a fit, but it also made it controllable! (realistic rite?). 3 years later his father was massacred at a funeral and Spaz started to travel through the realms to find his inner meaning.
Special Ability: He spazzes super fast and can occasionally spread the spaz to another person.
Skill: He holds knives while he spazzes so he can chop up anyone who comes near.

Read full topic

item.title: Nexus Hub [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: SadSnake
item.description:
Name/Alias:Skyla
Age: 19
Gender: Male
Plane of Origin: Eleos-12
Appearance: Skyla’s appearance
Backstory: Originally from eleos-12, he went to Velonia as soon as he was able to go through the nexus. At first, it was only to observe the universe he was curious about. But he eventually couldn’t help but try to leave his mark on it. He came to Velonia with enough equipment to put on shows, and pretends he was a bard blessed by magic, taking advantage of the citizen’s lack of knowledge to gain money and fame.
Others: Has engineer liar and acting skills. Many people around town owe him a favor, or several favors. Many have mistaken him for a woman, much to his dismay. Doesn’t know how to play the lute.
TECHNO REALM
Species: Neksians. They are humanoid cats, with their appearances ranging from completely human to faces of cats. Majority of Neksians however look human.
Special Ability: Has access to powerful supporting magic, but only when he plays with true intentions.
Equipment: All the equipment needed to make a small concert. A taser for protection that he hides in his clothes.
A lute with a speaker hidden inside and a MP4 with a variety of songs.

Read full topic

item.title: Nexus Hub [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: SoulShard
item.description:
Name: Vera (Real name unknown)
Age: ??
Gender: Female
Plane of Origin: Velonia
Appearance:

Backstory: Vera who’s true name has been forgotten is a Enchanted Spirit who truly believes that she is alive she refuses to accept that she died long ago. she spent most of her time apart of the thieves guild of lights shire before it was taken over due to her presumed magic of being able to go though walls. she never knew what she was doing was wrong.
Species: Enchanted Spirit: A rare type of spirit from Velonia that is said to be able to have magic of its own. those who have seen this claim they look exactly as they did in life. no one knows how a Enchanted Spirit comes into the world.
Magic:
Phase Shift Veras Enchanted Spirit powers is her able to at will turn her body corporeal or reverse it (When corporeal her body acts like it did in life including blood and pain)
Skills:
Spirit Form as a Enchanted Spirit is able to walk though walls and other stuff without the use of magic but not when she is corporeal
Stealth Ability Vera is incredible in the art of stealth

Read full topic

item.title: Nexus Hub [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Damafaud
item.description:
CHARACTER INFORMATION
Name/Alias: Dinara Senade
Age: 25
Gender: Female
Plane of Origin: Velonia
Species:

Night Elf

The origin of Night Elves was said to be an elf clan who wished to achieve immortality in order to fully taste the full bearing of life. They performed a ritual described in an ancient manuscript told to be older than the world itself, hoping it would fulfill their wish. Many versions appeared on how the grand ritual failed. A sabotage by their own member, a false instruction in the manuscript. Nevertheless, the ritual failed and left the elves as shadows, stripped from their enchanting appearance that charmed mortals far and wide.

In vain, the first of Night Elves tried to reverse the damage, but it was too late.They covered their shadowy form with a magic augmentation that will change their appearance into figures as imagined by others. It was not enough, but it was all they have. The Night Elves hid from other elf clans in shame and blend with humans, only dare to tread the world under the cover of the moon and ink black sky. Yet they continued to live, having learnt their lesson. Life is a good thing, and one won’t cherish a good thing unless it has an end.

If a Night Elf is seen without his glamour, he will be seen as a shadow figure, similar to those of a silhouette. He would be as tall as the person who sees him with a pair of glowing yellow eyes on their face. The shadow themselves are dense and trying to run a hand through one will be a useless struggle.

With his glamour on, a Night Elf can take the appearance of what a person imagine. The glamour that covers a Night Elf tricks all senses, changing the Night Elf skin tones, muscles build, intonation and melody of voice, fragrance, and other physical attributes to fit the onlookers thought.

A Night Elf is always shrouded by illussion, but able to suppress it, avoiding unneeded attention on daily life activities. A Night Elf’s shadow form normally can only be seen by elves and witches. Other species will only see them as humans. However, there were cases when an injured Night Elf turns into his shadow form as his magical energy focused itself on keeping the Night Elf alive.

They lost most of their elven heritage, including their affinity with nature magic. They do keep their enchanting charm and their meddles with spells left them with a unique bit of magic of their own. They call it trust magic, although they are unsure of the reason they earned it.

Magic:
Beauty Glamour: Dinara’s illussion allow her to turn into the image of beauty from another person’s mind.
Favour Coins: By exchanging favour or request from another person, Dinara is capable of casting magic otherwise restricted from herself.
Skill: Persuasion and acting, brewery and potioneering, negotiation
Appearance:
Backstory: A runaway from an aristocrat family, she was picked up by the Archmage who perceived her ability in magic, and heritage as night elf. Dinara spends her time mostly as his apprentice, helping him facing problems in Velonia.
Others: Her parasol is a magic artifact that is capable of controlling wind.

Read full topic

item.title: Nexus Hub [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Damafaud
item.description:
CHARACTER INFORMATION
Name/Alias: Helena Senade (Lena)/ Pageant Girl
Age: 18
Gender: Female
Plane of Origin: Callinety Falls
Special Ability: Real Beauty
Lena is capable of exerting a glamour that can change how she is appears to others. She can make herself more beautiful or hideous.
Skill: Close combat (Mix of muay thai and Silat), stealth and deception, novice sharpshooting, novice legal knowledge,
Appearance:
Backstory: Living with her uncle, due to her parents’ frequent work related travel, Lena decides to takes several years off exploring many careers before deciding on a stable job.
Others: Her favored weapons are toya and kerambit, though she is learning how to use guns.

Read full topic

item.title: Nexus Hub [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Shurian
item.description:
Name: Liz Sylvia
Age: 13
Gender: Female
Plane of Origin: Eleos-12 (Currently in Velonia)
Appearance: (Height is at 130cm)

Backstory: She was orphaned as a baby, and was found wandering and stealing from the holy capital. Eleanor the Priestess caught her stealing from a stall, but Arthas decided to take in this little girl. She now idolises Arthas and seeks to stay by his side. Is chummy with Eleanor, calling her “Elly” and Arthas “Arthy”.
Characteristics: Mischievous, Playful. Curious and Naive. Loyal. Impatient, Hot-Tempered.

Species: Neksians. They are humanoid cats, with their appearances ranging from completely human to faces of cats. Majority of Neksians however look human.
ARCANA REALM
Magic: While she has latent magic potential inside, she has not gained the ability to tap into her mana pool. She has only learnt how to use this to cloak herself in a stealth cloak, for her to steal things. Eleanor is training her to no avail.
Heightened Senses of Smell, Hearing and Taste.

Yes. She likes sweet things.

Read full topic

item.title: Nexus Hub [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: SadSnake
item.description:
Name/Alias:–
Age: 6 months
Gender: Male
Plane of Origin: Velonia
Appearance: The snake’s appearance
Backstory: Seperated from the other Keyras, he is searching to reunite with them.
Others: Less intelligent than humains, although much smarter than other animals.
ARCANA REALM
Species: Keyra. A species of snake near exctinction with only a dozen members remaning, due to hunting to obtain their magical scales. The small space between their scales softly glows, but the color is different for each individual and type of magic.
Magic: Controls water and ice. He can make ice out of water, but not create it out of thin air.
Skill: Fangs inject drugs that make people happy and peaceful.

Read full topic

item.title: Nexus Hub [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: CheesyKnives
item.description:
Name: Erin
Age: 12
Gender: Female
Plane of Origin: Velonia
Appearance: A quite small girl with red hair and brown eyes. Wears a boys tunic and trousers.
Backstory: After her village was raided by the Lich Lord, which caused her mother’s and father’s death, Erin vowed to live to see the death of the Lich Lord, no matter what it took. She is quite headstrong and determined normally, but becomes very rash when angry.
Magic: None (yet)
Skills: Persuasive nature.

Read full topic

item.title: Nexus Hub [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: photonproton
item.description:
Name: Orbi
Age: ???
Gender: Male
Plane of Origin: Eleos-12
Species: Pervolvian – Generally large, insectoid creatures who can retreat into their shell (which is spherical) and roll around. They are generally pitied by other species due to their fairly disgusting look and how their eyes cannot see very well.
Special Abilities: Dr. Orbi is intelligent. He is miniscule compared to normal Pervolvians, at roughly the size of golf ball (this is due to his egg being damaged by a human as he was growing). He can bounce around in ball form unlike normal Pervolvians.
Appearance: Slimy, spiked body with small limbs. Has two pincers as mouths and two eyes which are normally covered by his goggles which let him see in different ways (which he invented). In ball form he is a sphere with occasional spikes; his arms wrap around his body in ball form.
Backstory: Orbi was abandoned by his parents when they saw his miniscule stature and he was homeless for many years. He built inventions out of thrown away items from bins and got better rapidly. He built a jetpack at very young and was noticed by a doctor who recruited him as a doctor of engineering. A few human years later he won his first award for building a deployable mech suit for himself. He then moved on to building commissions from people and occasionally is commissioned by important people or leading scientists

Equipment: Cosmic spanner which is an energy spanner designed by Orbi which as well as working as a normal spanner, it can charge up machines and warp gravity to make hitting things have more force; Goggles which lets Orbi see better

Read full topic

item.title: Nexus Hub [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Shurian
item.description:
CHARACTER INFORMATION
Name/Alias: Reys
Age: 102
Gender: M
Plane of Origin: Velonia
Appearance: PENDING
Backstory: Once the head of the weaponsmiths, he once created a legendary sword, that was meant to be passed down to his descendants. However, the LichLord coveted the sword, and he was bested in battle against the LichLord. He was reborn as a vampire, and was made to devour his family, save for one. He regrets and hates the LichLord dearly. He vents his hate on the assignments he partakes, and therefore turns brutal on people. He does emphatise and tries to make as much leeway on his assignments as possible.
Others:

Read full topic

item.title: Nexus Hub [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: SoulShard
item.description:
Name Cidel
Age 524
Gender Male
Plane of Origin Velonia

Appearance
**

Backstory While most undead despise the lichlords control Cidel has no problem. as long as he gets test subjects to perform his research on. the only thing worse then getting turned into a slave of the lichlord is being sent to Cidel.

however 1 unforgotten day is when Cidel made a mistake so big he was forced into the service of Rey. the mistake is so embarrassing Cidel does not speak of it**

Magic
Fire magic: CIdel is able to use fire magic to great effects.
Flight: using his staff as a focus Cidel is able to fly but not for great period of times

skills anatomy knowledge: Cidel has spent years understanding how the bodys of living creatures work and is able to use this skill to better fight those he has experimented on

Read full topic

item.title: Nexus Hub [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
Name: Experimient 948 Delta (DATA/Delta)
Age: 2/127 (creation/start of experiment)
Plane: Eleos-12
Gender: No actual gender, goes as male
Species: Liquid data
A grey goo-esque creature with the ability to control and improve complex structures

Special Abilities:
Upgrade - you know the ben 10 alien by the same name? yeah that, but limited to only things of a certain complexity. note, complexity =/= circuits
Data Wanderer - is able to visualize various computers or magical items of a sufficient complexity as a 3-dimensional world in which to roam.
Download - is somehow able to absorb RAM/storage in computers (or complex magic items) in order to increase his capabilites/size respectively
Equipment: himself
Appearence:

(this but 5"x3" and no Omnitrix thing)
Backstory: A mad scientist, in an attempt to create an AI with a biological body ended up creating a monster able to transfer between computers, which has obviously thrived on Eleos as his method of interaction enables him to get around any obstacles in “creative” ways

DATA is currently stowed away in an unknown spaceship, gathering RAM and storage

Read full topic

item.title: Nexus Hub [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Damafaud
item.description:
Name/Alias: Triage Ward/ Tri

Age: 36

Gender: Male

Plane of Origin: Eleos-12

Species: Bioengineered Human
A human with faster cell regeneration and longer lifespan thanks to technology.

Special Abilities:
Biology Manipulation
Triage is capable of manipulating the activity of living cells, tissues, organs, and organisms. This ability is limited to direct contact.

Equipment: Portable lab equipment set
Vials of chemicals
First aid kit
Appearance:

Backstory: In a failed attempt by his father to create a more superior human, he tries to inject a foreign power into Triage. The experiment is half successful, allowing Triage to have complete control over his body and developing strange abilities. His father dies when he try to perform the same surgery to himself.

Triage resides in Callinety after the collission, finding it more peaceful than Eleos-12.

Read full topic

item.title: Nexus Hub [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Shurian
item.description:
CHARACTER INFORMATION
Name: Arthas Sylvia
PLANE: Callinety Falls
AGE: 23
Gender: M
Species: Human (Meta)
Personality: Kind, Naive, Passionate, Hot-Headed.
Appearance: 5 Feet, 6 Inches (168cm), 74 kilograms (163pounds). A

BIO: A friend of Kaito, known since childhood. Has went to Velonia to “holiday”. He has a sworn brotherhood with Kaito, though they may have been born on different dates, they will promise to see each other through hardships and cruelty, and that they will die on the same day.
Special Ability: Weapon Spatial. He has a personal dimension where he can switch weapons from.
Skills: Master Swordsmanship, has sparred with Kaito for many years. Communication of Velonian Languages. Stamina training.
Item: Luggage (10 Potions), Wallet, Rapier, Twin Swords.

Read full topic

item.title: Nexus Hub [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Marluxion
item.description:
might as well make an official character sheet out of him

Name/Alias: Serkosa Brightblade / Commander Serkos
Age: 51 (Died at 21.)
Gender: Male
Plane of Origin: Velonia
Appearance:
https://i.imgur.com/bySWKvF.jpg
Backstory: From a young age, Serkosa trained to be a valiant knight. As a teenager he sought glory and fame. This all changed when his entire village was eradicated by The Lich Lord. Since that day, he trained under a Paladin named ‘Sir Rodrich of Astran’. On his master’s deathbed, just before he passed away, he sacrificed his life and his afterlife to give Serkos the ability to avenge his family. He became renowned as an undead slayer, wielding a mighty two handed greatsword that shone with a holy light.

However, things didn’t go as planned. Serkos grew arrogant, and missed his opportunity to kill the Lich Lord. Instead, he was burned alive by the fiend’s green flame. However, the Lich Lord wouldn’t let death be his end. He reanimated Serkos’ remains and has kept him bound in servitude for over 30 years.

Species: Undead Skeleton. Previously human.
Magic: Channel Holy Energy: From his hands, he can release a blast of light. The light is devastating to a normal undead. Capable of eradicating hordes of skeletons in an instant.

Alternative Uses of the Ability:
Can Channel Holy Power through a weapon, increasing the weapon’s potency.
Can heal someone’s wounds with the holy light.
Can sacrifice their life and soul to pass on this magic to someone else.

Skills: Great tactician, Masterful sword fighter and very charismatic/persuasive.

Read full topic

item.title: Nexus Hub [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Name: Centas Zelan
Age: 25
Gender: Male
Plane of Origin: Velonia
Appearance: Icy blue eyes, that seem to stare into your soul. Jet black hair. Composed posture, slightly taller than average. Bony and long fingers. Off putting, in a way that is hard to describe.
Backstory: The child of two travelling merchants, born in Northern Velonia. Taking the profession of his parents, he has wandered the world. In a life and death struggle with some bandits, he discovered his magical talent when he froze them to death. After 3 years of magical studies, he left.
Species: Human
Magic: Frost: Uses his own life force.

  • Manipulates Ice/Snow
  • Creates Ice/Snow
  • Destroy Heat

Skills: Decent Swordsman, Persuasive

Read full topic
